features: Place the slim Ameriwood Home Owen Retro Desk in the living room, dining room or bedroom for an industrial feel
Minimal assembly required. Dimensions: 26.75 inches h x 40 inches w x 19.5 inches d. Shipping weight is approximately 30.21 pounds
A light brown with gray undertones top pairs perfectly with the gray hairpin legs.Do not use harsh chemicals or abrasive cleaners
This unit was crafted from laminated particleboard with powder coated metal legs.Dust and wipe with a dry cloth and if needed, a damp cloth may be used sparingly
Complete your room with other items in the Owen series (sold separately)
body.description: Create space in small and medium-sized rooms with the Ameriwood Home Owen Retro Desk. Make the most of this piece’s versatility by using it as a desk, vanity or console in the office, den, living room or bedroom. Able to support up to 80 lbs., it’s great for holding your laptop, important paperwork, desk lamp and family photos. Plus, the light brown/gray woodgrain finish coupled with the metal hairpin-style legs reminiscent of mid-century designs creates an industrial look and feel. Assembly of this desk is simple; all you have to do is attach the 4 metal legs to the laminated particleboard tabletop. The assembled dimensions are 26.75"h x 40"w x 19.5"d.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Work From Home With a wide variety of desks, file storage, and bookcases, you are sure to find what you need easily and comfortably work from home!

L Desk Our spacious L-shaped desks give you the ability to place your desk in the corner or in the middle of your home office to define your workspace however you need. The large desktop provides plenty of space for your computer or laptop, printer, and projects so you can work from home with ease. Writing Desk Perfect for small spaces, our writing desks offer valuable workspace in a compact size. These desk are ideal for smaller apartments, dorm rooms, or bedroom home office spaces. Lift Top Desks Comfortably work from home with our convenient lift-top desks. Go from sitting to standing with ease so you are always able to work from a comfortable position. Our durable metal lift-top mechanisms allow you to simply adjust your desktop height and are sturdy enough to last for years! Desks with Storage No need to bring clutter into your home office! Our desks with storage offer shelves and/or drawers to keep your home office neat and organized so you can focus on work! L-Desk Writing Desk Lift-Top Desks Desks with Storage

Options Bookcases with Doors Whether you need a place to organize books and manuals or need more storage for extra office supplies, our bookcases with doors provide plenty of storage for home office essentials. The doors will keep your items dust free and offer an elegant upgrade to your home office. Open Shelf Bookcases Whether you need a place to organize books and manuals or need more storage for extra office supplies, our open shelf bookcases provide plenty of storage for home office essentials. Available in 3, 4, or 5 shelves, you will have all the space you need to have easy access to work from home essentials. File Cabinet Keep your important documents stored away and organized with our lateral file cabinets. The large drawers can hold both legal and letter size files, so you always have easy access to the paperwork you need. Use as a printer stand to free up desk space, perfect for smaller workspaces!

Dakota L Desk with Bookshelves Lawrence 4 Shelf Ladder Bookcase Core 2 Drawer File Cabinet Parsons Desk with Drawer Haven Retro Desk with Riser Available Colors Black Oak, White, Espresso, Gray, Rustic Oak Black Black, Espresso Black, White, Espresso and Many More! Walnut, Natural, Gray Oak, White, Espresso Assembled Dimensions 28.31”H x 51.34”W x 53.62”D 60”H x 20.5625”W x 18.5”D 24.4375"H x 15.5625"W x 14.75"D 30”H x 39”W x 19.7”D 35.4”H X 44.7”W X 23.8”D Assembly Required? ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the right size
reviews.reviewText: Cute little desk, perfect for a laptop and book/folder, very sturdy amazing price. Super easy for one person to put together, took less than 5 min.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not exactly grey, but just what I wanted!
reviews.reviewText: I was a little torn between 4 and 5 stars, but I went with 5, and I'll explain why.My only complaint is that the color is not really as pictured. Other reviewers have said the same. Indeed, it does not look like natural wood up close. I don't mind that; I liked the idea of the grey top. It's less grey than a sort of combo grey-brown, a little paler than a natural wood would look. I like that because it's more airy and modern, but be aware that the color is less pure grey than you might expect.It was incredibly easy to put together. You really don't even need the instructions, just use common sense. Took about ten minutes by myself.It is also, as others have noted, a shorter desk than average. However, I - as a 5' 4'' woman - consistently have issues with desks that are just an inch or so too high, and when I work for a prolonged period of time my arms get a little tired. This is a PERFECT height for me. The construction seems very stable (I just got it today so if this changes, I'll write another review), especially for the price. It's wide enough to be roomy, allow me to keep things on both sides of the desk while still having space for me to move around and work on my computer in the middle. I really love it. Great for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This table is perfect for casual use or for decorative purposes. I will be using mine as an extra study space for my office. It was super easy to build and is aestheically pleasing to the eye. For <$40 this table was an awesome buy. Would recommend for a small space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a desk; but a great pair (or two) of legs on an occasional table.
reviews.reviewText: There is so much going for this unconventional table, and so little wrong.First off, as said in other reviews, this is not a desk. It's about the hight of a school desk. Not something you would want to work at unless you're in the under-5 foot set. This would be great as an entrance table, where you drop your keys and mail, admire the fresh flower arrangement and set down your gloves, hat, and cigarette case before regaling your lover about today's traffic while enjoying a well-deserved cocktail they had the Spidey senses to pour a mere minute before you arrived.Pros: The legs look great. They *look* solid like re-bar, but they're hollow and lightweight making the table easier to move. The top is not wood, but a fairly passable oak laminate, like laminate flooring. At first glance it looks solid, but it doesn't take much effort to see that the edge laminate does not line up with the ends of the "planks". Another PRO: the bottom of the table is finished. This sat at the top of a staircase and looked fine.Cons: The word "desk" in the description. This is much too small for that, an odd duckling of a size and height of standard tables (too low, short for a console table, too deep for an entrance table, too large as an end table).I've moved this piece a few times, and it now lives in my home office holding paperwork I don't want to deal with. I've put a retro school chair in front of it for fun. And because it looks like I have under-aged employees without dealing with pesky child labor laws.I'm tempted to buy the matching TV stand/entertainment center and swap the legs. (http://www.amazon.com/Ameriwood-Industries-Altra-42-Inch-Gunmetal/dp/B00L27K5KK/ref=pd_bxgy_196_text_z)Not much of a hack, but this table's top is a good size for a coffee table, and I think it would look great to have the A/V components at this table's height in the other table's top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The EASIEST ASSEMBLING EVER in My Life⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
reviews.reviewText: The below customers' comments on how easy the assembling this table were 99% TRUE❤️ "Less than 5 minutes is not true though . . . just taking parts out of the huge box takes 5 minutes, so. I'm happy about easy assembling and the cool look of the table🥰 🔻[I'm a petite 5'1 tall adult woman. Feeling challenged by one customer's comments on "just use your common sense but no manual necessary . . .," I DID NOT READ THE INSTRUCTION, . . . Ta Da~~~, I SUCCESSFULLY ASSEMBLED MY TABLE ALL BY MYSELF!!)].--- ".- It was incredibly easy to put together. You really don't even need the instructions, just use common sense...," and - "...Super easy for one person to put together, took less than 5 min." ---

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, well-made, perfect height
reviews.reviewText: Arrived safely and very well packaged. The desktop is quite substantial and the legs sturdy. This is a terrific piece of furniture for a small space. The height is a bit lower than "standard" desk height. I am 5ft 1in and most desks are just too tall for me. Not this one though, it's the perfect height for me. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: I needed something easy to put together, seems sturdy I use it every morning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Short in every way!! Good for kids!
reviews.reviewText: CONS: Looked taller and longer on the pic. It’s actually very low and short. It comes below my waist and doesn’t expand much by length. I had to order a much larger desk but I had to use this the first couple of weeks for my business. I felt like I was sitting in a kid’s desk. I also didn’t have room to hold necessary paperwork. I had to set items on the floor due to the lack of room. PROS: it’s very cute, sturdy and easy to assemble. I decided to give it to my my 10 year old and put it in her room.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great little desk, perfect for small rooms.
reviews.reviewText: No complaints! Desk is easy to set up and sturdy enough for all my computer equipment/monitors and more. It's made of press-board and metal, and doesn't wobble when I'm using it. It's also got a nice weight to it, so you aren't pushing it around all the time. The wide-angled legs mean I'm not smacking them all the time with my shins, and the desk is high enough to fit my small office chair. Probably not enough height/space for a taller man or heavier people, but for most it should be great. For reference, I'm 5'5''/slim and have no issues with the height or size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 20, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Got this at a really good price - love the desk, is super stylish.Did have a few nicks and can see how it would not weather the test of time but at the price I paid, I don’t mind.

Llegó antes de lo pronosticado y bien empacada.El producto lo recibí sin ningún daño, y fue muy sencillo de armar.Algo que me preocupaba es que se fuera a estar tambaleando, y no fe el caso, quedó muy estable.La encontré en promoción, y considero que por ese precio valió completamente la pena.

I was nervous as I read previous reviews it sounded like the desk was super small and poor quality but when it arrived for me it’s VERY easy to build, sturdy, and absolute perfect desk height. It’s great quality and looks great in my condo.

Excelente opción si se busca un escritorio pequeño y a buen precio. Es muy fácil de armar y, una vez armado, está bastante estable (a comparación de algunos otros muebles que uno arma que salen malos o "flojos"). Los materiales son buenos y quedé contento con esta compra.
